   Does anyone know how I can check if Fujii Matazaemon (the Ako 
Asano =
Family Advisor in Edo) who was there when the whole "47 Ronin" 
thing went =
down (but was not one of the 47 ronin)  ... is there 
anybody here who woul=
d know how to check if he was related to the 
same Fujii family which comes=
 out of Hiroshima/Okayama prefecture ? 
This is the same Fujii family which=
 Fujii Kogen and Fujii Taroemon 
came from. This is also the same Fujii fam=
ily which the majority of 
Fujii these days come from.

 Fujii Matazaemon's=
 son , Fujii Umon, was executed by the Tokugawa 
Shogunate because of his i=
nvolvement with the Meiwa Inncident (The 
first real movement by western fa=
milies to bring the Emporer back 
into power and oust the Tokugawa Shogunat=
e).

    Any info is appreciated.

 Thank you.
